front.title: Scenarios for an Internet-Scale Event Notification Service (ISENS)

abstract.t: This document's goal is to organize the discussion of a potential 'InternetScale Event Notification Service' (ISENS) working group effort by defining amodel of Event Notification Service (ENS), identifying a taxonomy of designchoices and their tradeoffs, sketching some usage scenarios, and brieflyevaluating a host of candidate solutions, old and new. [NOTE: this edition is largely unchanged from an August 13th, 1998 draftpresented at the Chicago NOTIFY BOF.]
